testcase.name: P3/U3 Extra version/main.c
testcase.error:
Type: scanf Severity: High
Security Alert: Check to be sure that the format string passed as argument 2 to this function call does not come from an untrusted source that could have added formatting characters that the code is not prepared to handle. Additionally, the format string could contain `%s' without precision that could result in a buffer overflow.
Location: - At line 24
